data.name: CarbonCopy
data.description: A tool which creates a spoofed certificate of any online website and signs an Executable for AV Evasion. Works for both Windows and Linux

data.name: mkcert
data.description: A simple zero-config tool to make locally trusted development certificates with any names you'd like.

data.name: getaltname
data.description: Extract subdomains from SSL certificates in HTTPS sites.

data.name: testssl.sh
data.description: Testing TLS/SSL encryption anywhere on any port

data.name: acmetool
data.description: :lock: acmetool, an automatic certificate acquisition tool for ACME (Let's Encrypt)
